title: Spell Thief
description:
Spell thief

A weaver of stolen magic, a parasite in the arcane ecosystem.

Spell Thieves do not only study magic â€” they **steal it**. They siphon spells mid-cast, hijack curses meant for allies, and redirect devastating effects back at their enemies. Reactive, tactical, and dangerous to spellcasters, a Spell Thief turns arcane power into a liability.
